code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import UserProfile from'./UserProfile';import NewPosts from'./NewPosts';import TopPosts from'./TopPosts';import RecentComments from'./RecentComments';import'./MainPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainPage=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState({logged_in_user_id:0,new_posts:[],top_posts:[],recent_comments:[]});useEffect(()=>{const fetcher=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/api/main');const data=await response.json();setData(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};fetcher();});if(data===null)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading..."});else return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uACC4\uC815"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserProfile,{userId:data.logged_in_user_id})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"new-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uC0C8 \uAE00"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewPosts,{posts:data.new_posts})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uC778\uAE30 \uAE00"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopPosts,{posts:data.top_posts})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"new-comment",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uC0C8 \uB313\uAE00"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecentComments,{comments:data.recent_comments})]})]});};export default MainPage;
